plugin.name: animation
plugin.long: Use various animations as window effects

option.name: minimize_match
option.long: The windows that will be animated.

option.name: unminimize_match
option.long: The windows that will be animated.

option.name: close1_match
option.long: The windows that will be animated.

option.name: close2_match
option.long: The windows that will be animated.

option.name: create1_match
option.long: Window that should animate with this effect when created.

option.name: create2_match
option.long: Window that should animate with this effect when created.

option.name: focus_match
option.long: Window that should animate with this effect when focused.

option.name: shade_match
option.long: Window that should animate with this effect when shaded.

option.name: unshade_match
option.long: Window that should animate with this effect when unshaded.

option.name: minimize_effect
option.long: The animation shown when minimizing a window.

option.name: minimize_duration
option.long: The number of seconds that the Minimize animation will last.

option.name: minimize_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to restore full list. If the list is empty, the default effect will be used.

option.name: unminimize_effect
option.long: The animation shown when unminimizing a window.

option.name: unminimize_duration
option.long: The number of seconds that the Unminimize animation will last.

option.name: unminimize_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to restore full list. If the list is empty, the default effect will be used.

option.name: close1_effect
option.long: The animation shown when closing a window.

option.name: close1_duration
option.long: The number of seconds that the Close #1 animation will last.

option.name: close1_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to restore full list. If the list is empty, the default effect will be used.

option.name: create1_effect
option.long: The animation shown when creating a window.

option.name: create1_duration
option.long: Animation duration in seconds for create effect #1.

option.name: create1_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to restore full list. If the list is empty, the default effect will be used.

option.name: close2_effect
option.long: The animation shown when closing a window.

option.name: close2_duration
option.long: The number of seconds that the Close #2 animation will last.

option.name: close2_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to restore full list. If the list is empty, the default effect will be used.

option.name: create2_effect
option.long: The animation shown when creating a window.

option.name: create2_duration
option.long: Animation duration in seconds for create effect #2.

option.name: create2_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to restore full list. If the list is empty, the default effect will be used.

option.name: shade_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to restore full list. If the list is empty, the default effect will be used.

option.name: unshade_random_effects
option.long: Pool of effects to be chosen from if Random effect is selected. Click reset to restore full list. If the list is empty, the default effect will be used.

option.name: rollup_fixed_interior
option.long: Fixed window interior during the Rollup animation.

option.name: all_random
option.long: All effects are chosen randomly, ignoring the selected effect. If None is selected for an event, that event won't be animated.

option.name: time_step
option.long: The amount of time in milliseconds between each render of the animation. The higher the number, the jerkier the movements become.

option.name: time_step_intense
option.short: Animation Time Step For Intense Effects
option.long: The amount of time in milliseconds between each render of the intense animation (Ex. Burn, Beam). The higher the number, the jerkier the movements become.

option.name: curved_fold_amp
option.long: Amplitude (size of the waves in the fold) of the curved fold relative to window width. Negative values fold outward.

option.name: razr_direction
option.long: Fold opening direction for pieces in Razr effect.

option.name: explode_gridx
option.long: The exploding window will be split into pieces along a grid. Specify the width, in pixels, of the columns in the grid.

option.name: explode_gridy
option.long: The exploding window will be split into pieces along a grid. Specify the height, in pixels, of the rows in the grid.

option.name: explode_tessellation
option.long: Tessellation type for exploding window pieces.

option.name: fire_constant_speed
option.long: Make fire effect duration be dependent on window height.

option.name: fire_mystical
option.long: Have random colors for the fire effect, also known as Mystical Fire.

option.name: glide1_away_position
option.long: Closeness of window to camera at the end of the animation (1.0: Close to camera, -2.0: Away from camera).

option.name: glide1_away_angle
option.long: Angle of window at the end of the animation.

option.name: glide1_thickness
option.long: Window thickness in pixels. Setting this to larger than 0 will disable shadow, blur, and reflection during the animation.

option.name: glide2_away_position
option.long: Closeness of window to camera at the end of the animation (1.0: Close to camera, -2.0: Away from camera).

option.name: glide2_away_angle
option.long: Angle of window at the end of the animation.

option.name: glide2_thickness
option.long: Window thickness in pixels. Setting this to larger than 0 will disable shadow, blur, and reflection during the animation.

option.name: horizontal_folds_amp
option.long: Amplitude (size of the waves in the fold) of the Horizontal Folds relative to the window width. Negative values fold outward.

option.name: horizontal_folds_num_folds
option.long: The number of horizontal folds that occur in the Horizontal Fold animation.

option.name: magic_lamp1_grid_res
option.long: Vertex grid resolution for Magic Lamp #1 (Y dimension only). This is the number of points used to define the curves. The higher the number, the smoother the curves. However there will be a loss of performance (CPU usage increases).

option.name: magic_lamp1_max_waves
option.long: The maximum number of waves for Magic Lamp #1.

option.name: magic_lamp1_wave_amp_min
option.long: The minimum amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp #1 will have.

option.name: magic_lamp1_wave_amp_max
option.long: The maxmimum amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp #1 will have.

option.name: magic_lamp1_create_start_width
option.long: Starting width of create effect and ending width of close effect for Magic Lamp #1.

option.name: magic_lamp2_grid_res
option.long: Vertex grid resolution for Magic Lamp #2 (Y dimension only). This is the number of points used to define the curves. The higher the number, the smoother the curves. However there will be a loss of performance (CPU usage increases).

option.name: magic_lamp2_max_waves
option.long: The maximum number of waves for Magic Lamp #2.

option.name: magic_lamp2_wave_amp_min
option.long: The minimum amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp #2 will have.

option.name: magic_lamp2_wave_amp_max
option.long: The maxmimum amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp #2 will have.

option.name: magic_lamp2_create_start_width
option.long: Starting width of create effect and ending width of close effect for Magic Lamp #2.

option.name: magic_lamp3_grid_res
option.long: Vertex grid resolution for Magic Lamp #3 (Y dimension only). This is the number of points used to define the curves. The higher the number, the smoother the curves. However there will be a loss of performance (CPU usage increases).

option.name: magic_lamp3_max_waves
option.long: The maximum number of waves for Magic Lamp #3.

option.name: magic_lamp3_wave_amp_min
option.long: The minimum amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp #3 will have.

option.name: magic_lamp3_wave_amp_max
option.long: The maxmimum amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp #3 will have.

option.name: magic_lamp3_create_start_width
option.long: Starting width of create effect and ending width of close effect for Magic Lamp #3.

option.name: sidekick_num_rotations
option.long: The number of rotations plus or minus 10% (for randomness) that Sidekick has.

option.name: wave_width
option.long: The width of the wave relative to the window height.

option.name: wave_amp
option.long: The wave amplitude (size of the waves) relative to the window height.

option.name: zoom_curvature
option.long: The amount of curvedness of the zoom motion.

option.name: zoom_from_center
option.long: Zoom from center when playing the Zoom and Sidekick animations.

plugin.name: fade
plugin.long: Fade in windows when mapped and fade out windows when unmapped

option.name: fullscreen_visual_bell
option.long: Fullscreen fade effect on system beep

option.name: minimize_open_close
option.long: Fade effect on minimize/open/close window events

plugin.name: minimize
plugin.long: Transform windows when they are minimized and unminimized

option.name: window_match
option.long: Windows that should be transformed when minimized

option.name: constrain_y
option.long: Constrain Y coordinate to workspace area

option.name: snapoff_maximized
option.long: Snapoff and auto unmaximized maximized windows when dragging

plugin.name: place
plugin.long: Place windows at appropriate positions when mapped

option.name: mode
option.long: Algorithm to use for window placement

option.name: position_matches
option.long: Windows that should be positioned by default

option.name: viewport_matches
option.long: Windows that should positioned in specific viewports by default

option.name: rotate_left_window
option.long: Rotate left and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_right_window
option.long: Rotate right and bring active window along

option.name: edge_flip_pointer
option.long: Flip to next viewport when moving pointer to screen edge

option.name: edge_flip_move
option.long: Flip to next viewport when moving window to screen edge

option.name: edge_flip_dnd
option.long: Flip to next viewport when dragging object to screen edge

option.name: rotate_to_1_window
option.long: Rotate to face 1 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_2_window
option.long: Rotate to face 2 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_3_window
option.long: Rotate to face 3 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_4_window
option.long: Rotate to face 4 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_5_window
option.long: Rotate to face 5 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_6_window
option.long: Rotate to face 6 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_7_window
option.long: Rotate to face 7 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_8_window
option.long: Rotate to face 8 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_9_window
option.long: Rotate to face 9 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_10_window
option.long: Rotate to face 10 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_11_window
option.long: Rotate to face 11 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_to_12_window
option.long: Rotate to face 12 and bring active window along

option.name: rotate_flip_left
option.long: Flip to left viewport and warp pointer

option.name: rotate_flip_right
option.long: Flip to right viewport and warp pointer

option.name: invert_y
option.long: Invert Y axis for pointer movement

option.name: snap_top
option.long: Snap Cube Rotation to Top Face

option.name: initiate_all
option.short: Initiate Window Picker For All Windows
option.long: Layout and start transforming all windows

option.name: initiate_group
option.short: Initiate Window Picker For Window Group
option.long: Layout and start transforming window group

option.name: initiate_output
option.short: Initiate Window Picker For Windows on Current Output
option.long: Layout and start transforming windows on current output

option.name: window_match
option.long: Windows that should be scaled in scale mode

option.name: overlay_icon
option.long: Overlay an icon on windows once they are scaled

option.name: hover_time
option.long: Time (in ms) before scale mode is terminated when hovering over a window

option.name: directory
option.long: Put screenshot images in this directory

option.name: launch_app
option.long: Automatically open screenshot in this application

option.name: next
option.long: Popup switcher if not visible and select next window

option.name: prev
option.long: Popup switcher if not visible and select previous window

option.name: next_all
option.long: Popup switcher if not visible and select next window out of all windows

option.name: prev_all
option.long: Popup switcher if not visible and select previous window out of all windows

option.name: window_match
option.long: Windows that should be shown in switcher

option.name: mipmap
option.long: Generate mipmaps when possible for higher quality scaling

option.name: zoom
option.long: Distance desktop should be zoom out while switching windows

option.name: auto_rotate
option.long: Rotate to the selected window while switching

plugin.name: water
plugin.long: Adds water effects to different desktop actions

option.name: size_matches
option.long: Windows that should be resized by default

plugin.name: wobbly
plugin.long: Use spring model for wobbly window effect

option.name: map_window_match
option.long: Windows that should wobble when mapped
option.default: Splash | DropdownMenu | PopupMenu | Tooltip | Notification | Combo | Dnd | Unknown

option.name: focus_window_match
option.long: Windows that should wobble when focused

option.name: grab_window_match
option.long: Windows that should wobble when grabbed

option.name: move_window_match
option.long: Windows that should wobble when moved
option.default: Toolbar | Menu | Utility | Dialog | Normal | Unknown

option.name: maximize_effect
option.long: Wobble effect when maximizing and unmaximizing windows

option.name: invert_y
option.long: Invert Y axis for pointer movement

option.name: filter_linear
option.long: Use linear filter when zoomed in
